send_to_extension.name: Send Transcription Directly to Extension
send_to_extension.description: Send transcription to AivoRelay Connector browser extension.
send_to_extension.userStory: Press hotkey → Speak your message → Your voice is transcribed and sent directly to the active AI chat tab (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.) via the browser extension. The message is auto-submitted.

enable.label: Enable Feature
enable.description: ⚠️ Risk: Your voice input is sent directly to the AI chat provider. You may accidentally send unintended audio to the AI.

warning.title: ⚠️ Warning: Risky Feature
warning.message: This feature sends your voice transcription directly to an AI chat provider through the browser extension. You may accidentally send unintended voice input to the AI. Are you sure you want to enable this?

pushToTalk.label: Push To Talk
pushToTalk.description: When ON: hold key to record. When OFF: tap once to start, tap again to stop.

send_to_extension_with_selection.name: Send Transcription + Selection to Extension
send_to_extension_with_selection.description: Send transcription plus selected text to AivoRelay Connector browser extension.
send_to_extension_with_selection.userStory: Select text anywhere (browser, editor, document) → Press hotkey → Speak your instruction (e.g., 'explain this', 'translate to Spanish') → The selected text + your voice instruction are combined and sent to the AI chat. Great for asking questions about code, articles, or any text.

enable.label: Enable Feature

warning.title: ⚠️ Warning: Risky Feature

help.title: What is Browser Connector?
help.description: Browser Connector sends your voice transcriptions directly to AI chat interfaces (like ChatGPT, Claude) through the <link>AivoRelay Connector</link> Chrome extension.
help.feature1: Speak and send messages directly to ChatGPT or other AI chats
help.feature2: Use "Send Transcription + Selection" to include selected text as context
help.feature3: Optional LLM processing before sending (e.g., translate, reformat)
help.feature4: Security Recommendation: You should change the connection password. On a fresh install, the extension uses a default password that could allow other programs to intercept your communication. Changing it here will automatically update the extension if it is connected. For maximum security, we recommend doing this while offline to prevent any local interference during the handshake.
